headline: T-Mobile AI Translation Puts Pressure On Duolingo Shares And Story
summary: T-Mobile has launched a real-time AI translation service that offers instant translations without requiring users to learn a language. The new service directly targets use cases that overlap with Duolingo’s language learning offering and paid subscription features. The development raises questions about how Duolingo will defend its value proposition against large technology competitors entering translation and language tools. Duolingo, listed as NasdaqGS:DUOL, is now facing a high profile...
